description:
Kumashiro Jun`ichirou is http://anidb.net/ch18062 [Maya]`s father. He spent his life on occult researches,built and directed the occult academy.
in the first episode,we can see him dead - by heart attack(?)- then a lamie take over his body,but http://anidb.net/ch18062 [Maya] kills him.
however in the last 2 episode it gets revealed,that was just a fake body,and he is yet alive.
also it appears,that he is the commander in the future of the organization,who sent Bunmei back in the past.
name: Kumashiro Jun`ichirou
